summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, extending and establishing of a public street and highway, to be known as Glenn Way, from the intersection of 44th Avenue Southwest and West Alaska Street to the intersection of 46th Avenue Southwest and West Genesee Street; providing for the establishing of the curb grades of said Glenn Way; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and for the making of the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the property abutting on said Glenn Way; providing for the taking of land in fee simple for general municipal purposes; providing that the entire cost of such improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law, except as otherwise provided for herein.
